file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] SERVICE ALERT: [-\w.]+;(?:Interface Errors on [-/\w ]+|Interface Errors);[()A-Z ]+;[A-Z]+;\d;(?:\(null\)|Total in Errors: \d+, Total out Errors: \d+)

FastFormatter.format: $2: State "$5" on host "$3" Interface Errors on "$10"

FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] SERVICE ALERT: [-\w.]+;(?:Physical|Real|Virtual) Memory;[()A-Z ]+;[A-Z]+;\d;(?:ERROR: No response from remote host|[A-Z]+: \w+ Memory [\d.]+ [MG]B Free,)

FastPattern.description: 8, SystemStatus: SERVICE ALERT, HP hardware status
FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] SERVICE ALERT: [-\w.]+;HP hardware status;[()A-Z ]+;[A-Z]+;\d;[-/\w.]+ Agent Check:
\[\d+\] SERVICE ALERT: [-\w.]+;Drive [A-Z];[()A-Z ]+;[A-Z]+;\d;(?:ERROR: No response from remote host|[A-Z]+: [A-Z]:\\ Label:.* Serial Number [a-f\d]+ [\d.]+ [GM]B Free,)
\[\d+\] SERVICE FLAPPING ALERT: [-\w.]+;[-\w ]+;[()A-Z ]+; *Service appears to have (?:started|stopped) flapping

FastFormatter.format: $2: State "$6" on host "$4" Interface Errors on "$10"

FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] SERVICE NOTIFICATION: [-\w.]+;[-\w.]+;(?:Traffic|Traffic on [-/\w ]+);[()A-Z ]+;[-\w]+;(?:\(Service Check Timed Out\)|Total RX Bytes: [\d.]+ [GM]B, Total TX Bytes: [\d.]+ [GM]B)

FastPattern.description: 19, SystemStatus: SERVICE NOTIFICATION, HP hardware status
FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] SERVICE NOTIFICATION: [-\w.]+;[-\w.]+;HP hardware status;[()A-Z ]+;[-\w]+;[-/\w.]+ Agent Check:

FastPattern.description: 22, ServiceInfo: SERVICE ALERT, services active matching
23, ServiceInfo: SERVICE ALERT, process found resembling
24, ServiceInfo: SERVICE ALERT, Directory Services Database
FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] SERVICE ALERT: [-\w.]+;[-/\w ]+;[()A-Z ]+;[A-Z]+;\d;Directory Services Database is open \(DS version [\w.]+\)

FastPattern.description: 25, ServiceInfo: SERVICE NOTIFICATION, services active matching
26, ServiceInfo: SERVICE NOTIFICATION, process found resembling

FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] Auto-save of retention data completed successfully\.

FastPattern.description: 29, ServiceWarning: SERVICE ALERT, Process name table
FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] SERVICE ALERT: [-\w.]+;[-/\w ]+;[()A-Z ]+;[A-Z]+;\d;ERROR: Process name table : No response from remote host "[-\w.]+"\.

FastPattern.description: 30, ServiceWarning: SERVICE ALERT, No data was received
FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] SERVICE ALERT: [-\w.]+;[-/\w ]+;[()A-Z ]+;[A-Z]+;\d;No data was received from host!

FastPattern.description: 31, ServiceWarning: SERVICE ALERT, No services matching
32, ServiceWarning: SERVICE NOTIFICATION, Process name table
FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] SERVICE NOTIFICATION: [-\w.]+;[-\w.]+;[-/\w ]+;[()A-Z ]+;[-\w]+;ERROR: Process name table : No response from remote host [-\w.]+\.

FastPattern.description: 33, ServiceWarning: SERVICE NOTIFICATION, No services matching

FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] Warning: The check of host '[^']+' looks like it was orphaned

FastFormatter.condition: The check of host '([^']+)' looks like it was orphaned (.+?)\..*
FastFormatter.format: The check of host "$4" looks like it was orphaned $5

FastFormatter.condition: The check of host '[^']+' looks like it was orphaned .+?\. +(.+?)\.+

FastPattern.description: 43, ServiceInfo: SERVICE ALERT, Return code; Service Check timed out
FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] SERVICE ALERT: [-\w.]+;[-/\w ]+;[()A-Z ]+;[A-Z]+;\d;\(Return code of \d+ is out of bounds|Service Check Timed Out\)

FastPattern.description: 44, SystemStatus: CURRENT HOST STATE, PING OK

FastField.defaultValue: Deletes the host downtime entry that has an ID number matching the "$4" argument
Deletes the host downtime entry that has an ID number matching the "$4" argument

FastPattern.pattern: \[\d+\] HOST FLAPPING ALERT: [-\w ]+;[()A-Z ]+; *Host appears to have (?:started|stopped) flapping
